movies.plot: Frozen in the ice for decades, Captain America is freed to battle against arch-criminal, The Red Skull.
movies.title: Captain America

movies.plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.
movies.title: Waterworld

movies.plot: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.
movies.title: Once Upon a Time
